bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with feng du 風毒 , wind poison. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 37: 毒風之變，冷熱 不同，故腠理發癩 , “Changes resulting from [being affected by] poison wind include uneven alternating sensations of cold and heat. Hence the skin structures develop repudiation-illness”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 refers to numerous pathological conditions associated with poison wind: du feng jiao qi 毒風脚氣 , poison wind with leg qi; dan shi du feng 丹石毒風 , cinnabar [et al.] mineral poison wind; dan du feng 丹 毒風 , cinnabar poison wind; du feng zhen bi 毒風疹痹 poison wind with papules and blockage.
